scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.scratch:enableMock:200: echo for (Profile p : [SELECT Id FROM Profile]) {API_Controller_Mock_Settings__c mockSetting = API_Controller_Mock_Settings__c.getInstance(p.Id); mockSetting.Status__c = 'OK'; mockSetting.Status_Code__c = '200'; mockSetting.Use_Mock__c = true; upsert mockSetting;} | sfdx force:apex:execute
scripts.scratch:enableMock:401: echo for (Profile p : [SELECT Id FROM Profile]) {API_Controller_Mock_Settings__c mockSetting = API_Controller_Mock_Settings__c.getInstance(p.Id); mockSetting.Status__c = 'OK'; mockSetting.Status_Code__c = '401'; mockSetting.Use_Mock__c = true; upsert mockSetting;} | sfdx force:apex:execute
scripts.scratch:deactivateMock: echo for (Profile p : [SELECT Id FROM Profile]) {API_Controller_Mock_Settings__c mockSetting = API_Controller_Mock_Settings__c.getInstance(p.Id); mockSetting.Status__c = 'OK'; mockSetting.Status_Code__c = '200'; mockSetting.Use_Mock__c = false; upsert mockSetting;} | sfdx force:apex:execute
scripts.scratch:postCreate: npm run scratch:user:enableDebug && npm run scratch:enableMock:200 && sfdx force:apex:execute -f ./dummy-data/GenerateData.apex
scripts.scratchSetup: sf apex run -f post-scratch/scratchSetup.cls && sf apex run -f dummy-data/GenerateData.apex
